title: HW10 Q1: Kernelized Linear Attention (Part II)
content: Problem Context: This is part 2 of the problem you saw on the last homework. It shows how kernelized approximations to softmax attention can be done with the same complexity as state-space models.
document: Problem Context: This is part 2 of the problem you saw on the last homework. It shows how kernelized approximations to softmax attention can be done with the same complexity as state-space models.

comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Hi! Are the solutions for this homework going to be released soon? I'm hoping to do my special participation A on this homework, and I want to make  sure I know the correct answers before I prompt the LLM. Thanks!</paragraph></document>
